functionDecorators.name: Buy
functionDecorators.description: Buy blocks identified by block_id_, pointing to their image file_hash_, each block is associated with a chunk_id_ (optional, set to zero if not used) block_paid_prices_ contains the prices that the sender is willing to pay for each block_id_ attachments contains some string like a website, for advertisement tags are for future usages.

functionDecorators.name: DistributeRewards
functionDecorators.description: Distribute the rewards to all the stakeholder who staked for the last epoch.

functionDecorators.name: SetSell
functionDecorators.description: Set the new price of a list of blocks, but the prices in xdai_sell_price_ can only be lower than the current xdai_price. The msg.sender must the owner of all blocks provided in block_id_.

parameterDecorators.name: block_id_
parameterDecorators.description: list of blocks to update price.

parameterDecorators.name: xdai_sell_price_
parameterDecorators.description: new price provided is WITHOUT BIDDING_PRICE_RATIO_PERCENT INCLUDED, take that into account before transaction.

functionDecorators.name: Stake
functionDecorators.description: A method for a stakeholder to create a stake. This method update the stake timestamp of the user.

parameterDecorators.name: _stake
parameterDecorators.description: The size of the stake to be created.

functionDecorators.name: StakeFromBalance
functionDecorators.description: A method for a stakeholder to create a stake.

parameterDecorators.name: _stake
parameterDecorators.description: The size of the stake to be created.

functionDecorators.name: TakeDown
functionDecorators.description: Takedown a zone that break the rules of the platform, get a reward.

functionDecorators.name: TriggerNextEpochAndRewards
functionDecorators.description: Trigger the new epoch, redistribute current epoch xdai balance calculate all rewards (staking, owners rewards, holders rewards) and distribute all owners staking rewards rewards the user that trigger this function with TRIGGER_REWARD xDai.

functionDecorators.name: Unstake
functionDecorators.description: A method for a stakeholder to Unstake.

parameterDecorators.name: _stake
parameterDecorators.description: The size of the stake to be unstaked and sent back to the user.

functionDecorators.name: UnstakeToBalance
functionDecorators.description: A method for a stakeholder to Unstake.

parameterDecorators.name: _stake
parameterDecorators.description: The size of the stake to be unstaked and sent back to the user.

functionDecorators.name: WithdrawTokens
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw _numTokens ERC20 tokens from the voting contract, revoking these voting rights.

parameterDecorators.name: _numTokens
parameterDecorators.description: The number of ERC20 tokens desired in exchange for voting rights.

functionDecorators.name: WithdrawxDai
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw _numTokens ERC20 tokens from the voting contract, revoking these voting rights.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The number of ERC20 tokens desired in exchange for voting rights.

functionDecorators.name: isStakeholder
functionDecorators.description: A method to check if an address is a stakeholder.

returnDecorators.description: bool, uint256 Whxdai the address is a stakeholder, and if so its position in the stakeholders array.
